subtitle: Tender lamb marinated in red wine vinegar.

method.text: Place the lamb in a shallow, non-metallic dish.
Mix all remaining ingredients together in a jug and pour over the meat. Leave to marinate in the fridge for 3-1 days, turning occasionally.
Preheat grill to a medium heat.
Remove the lamb from excess marinade and grill for about 10-15 min, basting frequently with the marinade. Transfer the meat to a warm serving plate and keep warm.
Pour the remaining marinade mixture into a saucepan to heat through before pouring over the lamb.

title: Grilled  lamb steaks
